content.prompt: Nomadic pastoralism is an extensive agricultural system practiced

choices.label: in the dry regions of Africa and Asia
in the tropical regions of Africa and Asia
by people who shift location in pursuit of rain clouds

unit.text: 5: Agriculture and Rural Land-Use Patterns and Processes

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe a relevant geographic concept, process, model, or theory in a specified context.
